title: Sunny Gold Coast 1000sqft King Size 1bdrm w/City Views
posting_body: ['1Bdrm w/BRAND NEW kitchen with white Shaker Cabinets, a quartz countertop with recessed sink, and new stainless steel appliances.', 'The updated bathroom has new lighting, a Kohler tub, new vanity, and a recessed mirrored medicine cabinet.', 'This charming and unusually spacious 1000 sq.', 'ft. Art Deco air-conditioned apartment has plenty of space for a separate home office.', 'This apartment has a sunny southern exposure with a nice view of Rush street and the downtown skyline.', ' Take yourself on a virtual 360 tour here: https://kuula.co/share/collection/7k7X0?logo=0&info=1&fs=1&vr=1&sd=1&', 'Apartment Features:', "* Living room has natural hardwood floors, classic picture moldings, sconce lights, and a 9' coved Ceiling", '* French Doors separate the living room from your office or breakfast room', '* BRAND NEW Stainless Steel Kitchen has lots of cabinets, a quartz countertop, a built-in microwave, and a pantry', '* King size bedroom with room to spare for nightstands and dressers', '* 2 huge walk-in closets', '* Bathroom has new vanity and mirrored medicine cabinet', 'Building Features:', '*', 'The building offers package delivery to your apartment daily', '* Smoke-free and pet-free building', '* Laundry room with 2 washers & dryers on every floor and only eight apartments per floor)', '* Intercom entry', '* Evening door staff', '* Heat, water, and refuse included in your rent.', 'Also, we do not charge any other additional monthly fees.', 'Neighborhood Features:', 'Perfect Chicago neighborhood to walk around in.', 'We are ideally located in the heart of the Gold Coast at Rush & Elm.', ' Nearby is La Colombe Coffee, Starbucks, Jewel grocery store, CVS, Walgreens, Urban Outfitters, Somerset, Gibsons, Tavern on Rush, the Red Line and lots of restaurants and shopping.', 'We are also 1 block from Oak Street beach, the Chicago lakefront bike/running path and Michigan Avenue.', 'Perfect Chicago neighborhood to walk around in.', 'We are located in the heart of the Gold Coast at Rush & Elm.', ' Nearby is La Colombe Coffee, Starbucks, Jewel grocery store, CVS, Walgreens, Urban Outfitters, Somerset, Gibsons, Tavern on Rush, the Red Line, and many restaurants shopping.', 'We are also one block from Oak street beach and the lakefront bike and running path.', 'ID:#602']
